name: Doughlings: Invasion
description:
“GET OUT OF MY PLANET!”In Doughlings: Invasion, the second game of the series, the story continues right where it left off. This time our hero Morpheus arms himself to defend his people from alien invaders. Morpheus is ready for battle with his unique personas all armed to the teeth! Varieties of raving space invaders and challenging bosses are all waiting in line to get their butts kicked by you!WRECK THE PLACE UP!Get ready for an adventure with an ever increasing pace and tension! Throughout the game you will develop novel battle strategies, acquire untold powers by modifying your DNA, and make life miserable for those unwelcome space invaders with your dazzling Show Off powers.GAME FEATURES
  • A new breath of life into the classic arcade shooter genre.
  • 5 distinct personas whose unique skills you can level up.
  • 15 different breeds of invaders that pose unique threats.
  • 5 grueling bosses.
  • Challenging the world with global leaderboards.
  • Gamepad, mouse, and keyboard support.
